oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Records, chute-side reports, what can new grads do?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bolinger, John D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: beef records
reports
chute-side
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ability to capture data chute-side can give the veterinarian a great opportunity to help producers beyond just utilizing their technical skills. This data can be turned into Management Event Reports that are designed to highlight key information for a specific event, such as pre-breeding/turnout, pregnancy diagnosis and weaning, heifer development, and bull breeding soundness exams. These reports can be created chute-side using a tablet and printed onsite, allowing the veterinarian to provide instant information to further discussions with producers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2021 Recent Graduate Proceedings ; 112-116
